definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: And so we get mired in decision-making quicksand.
sentences.chinese: 就这样，我们陷入了决策困难的流沙。

sentences.english: Two people stuck in quick sand can't help each other.
sentences.chinese: 两个陷入流沙的人是不可能互助的。

sentences.english: It is a blazing hot expanse of rolling sand dunes under a cloudless sky.
sentences.chinese: 万里无云的天空下，它是一片充满流沙的灼热区域。

sentences.english: The thatched cottage was submerged by drift sand.
sentences.chinese: 这个茅草屋被流沙淹没了。

sentences.english: The Shifting Sands are the impassable deserts surrounding the Land of Oz.
sentences.chinese: 在书中，围绕在奥兹国周边的大漠流沙是不可穿越的。

sentences.english: Sand-fixing mechanism and shirting sand control effect of sand-barrier.
sentences.chinese: 沙障固沙机理与流沙控制效益。

sentences.english: Supercilious and self-conceited is the quicksand of success.
sentences.chinese: 高傲自大是成功的流沙。

sentences.english: These tree belts effectively protect the farmland against shifting sand.
sentences.chinese: 这些防护林带有效地保护了农田，使之免受流沙侵袭。

sentences.english: Derived from the wind profiles, aerodynamic roughness of artificial vegetational belt is remarkably higher than that of moving sand surface.
sentences.chinese: 人工植被带地表空气动力学粗糙度显著高于流沙区。

sentences.english: Elegance is a means sand, old is a Love.
sentences.chinese: 风华是一指流沙，苍老是一段年华。
